data.text: It's ok.When I click on an ad and it takes me to the app the actual item from the ad is nowhere to be found.I do like the membership and ease of browsing but their usually out of my size and most of the styles I look up.Also, the outfits on the models/the outfit match up with the shoes could be much better for outfit ideas...Other than that the buying and shipping processes are good.I once bought shoes that were too small and the return process was easy.I also enjoy the customization tool.

It's pretty good it does have it problem when I add items onto the cart and take the items off. It somehow glitches and freezes, so I can not make a transaction. I once had to log out and blog back into my account to make a purchase. I do wish it would let me know if and only when I bought an item and they run out of stock that they let me know before my transaction goes through. Although it's been a long while since that happened, Nike may have fixed this problem.

This app (as with many apps), likes to reformat....often. Those of us that are "older" ðŸ˜¬ðŸ˜„ PREFER an easier, streamlined online experience. Sure, the "old look" might be "boring", but there's an ease-of-use in simplistic terms. I don't like navigating through some site, to try and figure it out. If it gets too confusing, I'm out. No shopping at that point. But it's been mostly alright, so far. I usually only look at running shoes, and maybe occasionally browse.

Overall it's great. You can easily navigate through the app. The only thing they should fix is when you change some of the specific preferences, like changing to only show shoes in a specific size, if you then swipe left from all to Jordan or anything else, then back to all it will reset your preferences so you then have to go back and select specifics again. This can get pretty annoying especially if you swipe left by accident and then have to reset everything and rescroll to where you were.

The scrolling gesture will a lot of times will cause the app to swipe to the right moving to a different category especially when scrolling with your thumb one handed. This wouldn't be too big of an issue if the app kept any filters you had applied active when swiping from one clothing category to the next. Unfortunately it resets filters and sends you all the way back to the top. Pretty frustrating at times especially if you managed to get way down the list.

Great looking app, functionally and aesthetically it looks awesome. But it often loses connection for no reason, sometimes when I click on an item listing then go back to scrolling it'll lose connection and just scrolling down it'll infinitely keeps loading spinning which I just give up and stop shopping. Very frustrating and it needs to be fixed.

The clothes and other gear are definitely not the issue here. It's the app, which like Adidas, could use more user-friendliness. The layout is not awesome to look at, the favorites should be more easily accessible, and it needs to be more clear which product you are buying. Instead of putting plus size and different color leggings all under one type, having them separate would be way easier. I loved that Express shipping was only 5 bucks tho. Great pieces, not so great website.

Overall I really loved the selection of products and the nike member's discounts, though some of the items I found were definitely out of my price range- I'd recommend it for anyone into athletic wear that doesn't mind paying a little extra for quality! There's something on here for everyone, and they have cheaper items for people on a tighter budget. :)

The App works wonderfully with no crashes. Very user friendly and straightforward. The reason I am only rating a 4 is for the 10am drops. The algorithm needs to be improved, so that customers actually interested in the new shoes and colorways do not lose to bots. I went to purchase my shoes and completed within 10 secs of the drop, and they were completely sold out. So unfortunately, if I am interested in new releases, I can only purchase for inflated resell prices.

I wish NiKE would include links to other items shown/paired with the featured item. For example, if the item ffeatured is a hoodie and the model is also wearing a beanie, pants, shoes and backpack, it'd be AWESOME if we could hover over those other items and click on the link that would take us to these other items (instead of trying to figure out if the suggested items at the bottom of the page would be a matching set) This would make my shopping much easier, more enjoyable and way faster!

I've never had a problem with the Nike app. It's well thought out and items are categorized for search ease. When viewing items, it recommends comparable items so you can easily find a style you like. Customer service is friendly and always helpful with sizing questions. I have had to return items before and it was simple and quick. Even refunds were quick and painless. 10/10 would recommend to family and friends. ðŸ’–

Great when it works trash when it doesn't. All of a sudden I get an error occured message everytime I try to check out. Have deleted and reinstalled the app and used different cards. This is not OK. Coming back a few months later to update. Original still holds true, and laty the app is freezing and not responsive. Deleted and reinstalled, still happens but not as bad.... looking forward to better updates to provide a consistent fluid experience.

The Nike App is very useful and has all the necessary features for shopping. Ease of use to purchase items and browse apparel. No major complaints overall. However, it would be very helpful to have features such as "most helpful" or "most critical" for customer reviews on products. This feature is handy for determining sizing/quality/comfort of apparel like shoes, pants, and shirts. I personally rely on this alot since I'm always in between sizes and I like to know the opinion of other buyers.

I ordered a pair of custom shoes and they arrived. I love everything about them. But as I attempted to open the app this morning it repeatedly said something is wrong and to try again. I did so and nothing had changed. So I uninstalled the app and reinstalled it. Now as I attempt to login, it doesn't load for even 2 seconds without sending me right back to the login/sign up page. I really just want to order another pair of shoes. The job that was done on my first pair were quite amazing.

Overall, shopping and searching site for specific items works well. Good at showing product availability and filters work well. However, major delays and poor performance (lag) on drops of items, particularly shoes. Certain steps of the checkout process are super slow and have caused me to miss out on purchasing items. This is very frustrating when you plan for the sale/drop and miss out due to poor app performance! There needs to be major improvement in streamlining the checkout process.

Only one problem with the ordering process. I had multiple things in my cart from previous visits. I was not shown those items because I entered the site from Facebook, not the actual app. Once I completed the order then I see the other items and had purchased them unintentionally. I thought I was ordering $190 pair of shoes and ended up with $431 of merchandise and the hassle of having to go thru the return process because the window for customer service is only 30 min.

I installed this app for the purpose of buying shoes. Waited for more than a month, when one day I received a message saying that my order has been returned already without prior notif. Nike failed to provide a tracking number, from the get-go, all that they could give me is the order number. I could've had prepped and had the leverage of tracking my orders. Very upsetting experience, of course, as it also ruined my plans for the try-outs. Uninstalling.

Unable to checkout. I've been trying for several days using the app and different browsers from my phone and my laptop. Just keeps freezing, and no one is able to help. I've seen same issues from 5 months ago and the support team is still clueless? Someone does not deserve their job and needs to get fired.

App is super simple to navigate. I made a purchase yesterday, and it gave me an arrival date that is 2 weeks from now. Not sure why it would take that long, but we'll see. Also, I have twin boys, and it is extremely hard to find the same shoes in their size. (Way harder than u would think).

Might be my favorite app next to where I get my music from. But being a member makes it so much better and easier can't wait till my birthday to get that discount every year -Loyal Nike fan! (Update) Just used my birthday gift and I couldn't be happier with my purchases. Love that they both came together in 2 days after I ordered them got about four more shoes I really want this year Love the app thanks Nike!

Although easy to navigate, constantly shows errors during transactions or even adding items to the bag. Even customizing shoes give error codes. I've been unable to purchase anything in months due to errors despite the app being up to date. Went as far as confirming a purchase I made for a christmas gift, only to find out it never actually go through and wouldn't allow me to remove the item from my bag unless logged into the web page. Better off using the web page instead

After you click on a product item and then go back into the list of items that you were browsing within, the item page glitches and doesn't show any product items. This issue needs to be fixed as it puts me off continuing to look for items or starting from the top again, and instead, i just close the app. Customer service is great through the live chat.

Checking out was a bit of a hassle, setting up mode of payment was confusing, specially when using cards. Also order or purchase tracking wasn't available until my item got delivered. button is displayed even though the item hasn't arrived yet instead of the button. Tracking should be available upon checkout.

It doesn't want to send me the code to sign in, and the one time I got it, it said "Invalid code". Yes I tried uninstalling the app and reinstalling it and also I restarted my phone like 4 times, but it still doesn't work. Please fix this bug.

Easy to navigate. However, I wish the app would generate return processes within the app vs forcing you to call someone. A simple return ended up taking most of my lunch hour because the live person sounded high as a kite and couldn't get my information correct. Live help is always best, but auto-generated codes are preferable to a stoned CSR. Nike, you're products are AWESOME, please ensure your CSRs are as well.

When the app actually loads, it freezes and crashes constantly. Most of the time it won't even load, just gives the message that "Something went wrong" and crashes. I've done all of the troubleshooting steps. Basically just rinse and repeat.

When something goes wrong with an order it is a nightmare to find any contact numbers for customer service on the app. Shows the contempt held by big companies for the customer. They only concentrate on what can provide them with an income and make it hard to complain or request refund or resolve issues. Very disappointing.

This is one of the easiest and efficient apps out there. Love how you can see when all the exclusive kicks and clothing is about to drop. Definitely a go to if your any type of sneakerhead or if you like to keep up to date with the newest and freshest fashion. 5 stars all the way

I ordered and paid for Air More Uptempo sneakers. After waiting 2 weeks and the order still not being shipped I wrote to them and it turned out that they had a technical problem and that's why they didn't send it. For 2 weeks no one informed me about this even though I had paid in advance. If I hadn't looked for them, I might still be waiting for my order. On top of that, they offered me a refund instead of sending me the sneakers even though they had stock. This was my first and last order!

App isn't allowing me to log into my account. It sends me the 8 digit code, I enter it, and it tells me it isn't an authorized code, I try again, and it says, "Internal service error... It's all over the Web... Why have an app if it doesn't function...?

I keep hitting join us and then it keeps going to the sign in page and then say my credentials are not correct and of course they're not correct because I'm not a flipping member yet. Can anyone help me and tell me what to do and how to fix it because I would like to buy about six pairs of shoes but you know if I can't get on here I guess I'll just go to Amazon

Experiencing registration issues; not receiving activation code via email despite multiple attempts with various email addresses and devices; and even using browsers on my PC, the problem persists . Assistance needed

When your order is wrong you can soeak to someone. The customer service is great. Sometimes, I don't get things I order. The system doesn't work too often. Love how easy it is to buy things and not have to go to the store.
Disappointed the app doesn't accurately show my route. It's showing all these zig zags instead of the circular route I took. Happened multiple times.
Sale is not very effective, doesn't make much of a difference. Doesn't make much of a difference. Options, quality, loyalty is very nice. All the products seem amazing. I personally love nike

Bought a pair , which was good ...However they ship the shoes from. EU which is okay and deliver them within the time frame which was mentioned..However they failed to disclose that by making a simple transaction in display currency, I still got charged a surcharge which got me off guard and I only got to know about it through transaction list. This entire thing is a spoiler and has deterred me in buying more from Nike and also the customer service provided was very average too

Crashes alot. When I change the filter and go into a specific section and then use back to go to main the filter clears. Links to snkrs app usually don't open app correctly. Links that come up on notifications in phone page for Nike app only work half the time.

I like the Nike app. I like the ease of use it doesn't crash. I would like to see the discount for military service find a way to be applied in a more user friendly way. The filter options are good but could be improved.

The most glitchy and frustrating app. Once it actually lets me login, rather than continually ask me to sign-in over and over, nothing loads. Blank images, missing text, forever spinning icon. Useless.

This app was great during the first time I used it. Placing order went quite well that time. But recently, when I try placing order, after I ticked the 'place order' button, it goes loading forever. Order is not going thru. It freezes. I tried to order again and again, but same thing happens. It does not allow me to place my order. It freezes all the time. Even the chat support agent cannot tell what's really wrong.

It's a good app and I get what I want from it. I've never had any problems with it and my orders get delivered straight to my doorstep . All I hate is just that when something is out of stock u can't search up niek stores that have that shoe but it's a great app

Love this app gives a great variety and organized look of your preference. Would recommend to any sneaker head. Never had any problems with support and got accurate answers and direction from their support team.

Doesn't allow notifications like the USA and UK etc, no access to shock drops, no special discounts. Waste of space on your phone. Much better off just browsing the normal website. You're not missing out on anything

Poor quality Products. The last 5 pairs of Nike shoes I have purchased have all started squeaking before i can even break them in. Also other defects. They're no longer a comfortable shoe either. I tried one last time to purchase "Jordan's" but sadly the same results. Nike has become an inferior product and I will no longer buy this brand. American made products from now on! I am deleting this app.

It's my first time using the app, and I very much enjoy looking at some of the latest Nike has to offer. I give it 4star ratings because majority of the product that I would like to order are out off stock. It would be amazing if Nike could notify me once they become available so that I could order them,
Always get what I order either on time or faster than expected. Much easier than dealing with stores in person. Much wider selections and the customization features are pretty cool.

This app has worked for me and I think I'm going to stick with it. I've tried other apps in the past, and I directly avoided this app because I assumed the prices were going to be outrageous, coming from the brand. I was wrong. I finally gave up on my stubbornness and downloaded this app, and I don't regret it. The app is trustworthy, and shoes are authentic, since they come straight from Nike manufacturers. They also have great deals. I found a $150 pair for only $98.97! Absolutely amazing.

Won't let me pay! Keeps saying there's an error and to contact customer service to solve it but when I googled the code I see many, many people having the same issue for a long time now so either Nike don't know how to fix it or just don't want to.

The SNKR app sucks!! Anytime there is any drop, I'm the first to go on there, I'm done processing my purchase in less than 15 seconds, then it's pending for about five minutes, then it's says my size is sold out! Every other size is available except size 15 I don't get it!! I refuse to pay resell prices!!

The app, much like the website, is a test for sainthood when trying to pay for an order. It has errors, timeouts and glitches. 8 attempts and 3 cards via PayPal later and still coming up with an error. My sister couldn't place the order for me either so it's not the Internet or my device.

Tried to order trainers online and got an error code. Downloaded the app. Tried to make a payment and got an error code. Spoke to someone who told me to uninstall and reinstall the app. Did that went back to the chat? They closed the chat down. Started another chat, by the time I typed up everything, they closed the chat, tried a 3rd time. I was then told I had been blocked for 24hrs and need to cone back tomorrow. I tried on my laptop, my phone, cleared cashes, tried 2 x different cards, shock

The stupid app keeps saying that it sent me a code to my email, whenever I leave the page to go to my email to get the code the page reboots every time I come back thus sending a new code!!!!!!! This is beyond frustrating why would I want to give my business to a company that makes it Beyond impossible to even shop on the site? Because obviously you should be able to shop without being a member of their VIP but that's not an option either smh!!!!

Love this. Its helps me pick the right shoe for me in the comfort of my home. Just saying I'm not a npc for saying that it's true. Every time I go out to get shoes I always get nervous and feel like I have to hurry up with my choice. But when I'm home I can take all the time I want and I don't even need to go pick it up I can just have it delivered. W app.

App is smooth, graphic quality is insane but only if you could allow users from South Africa like me to pay for your product using installments because some of the stores don't have what l mostly like and if available in store l pay using installments but unfortunately 90% of your product isn't there in stores and in my town there's no nike store.

Very smooth time shopping then purchasing 5 Nike items last week. This was my first time using the app instead of their website so I'm definitely pleased overall. Will ðŸ’¯ be back the next time I'm in the mood for some new Nike swag! ðŸ”¥ðŸ‘ðŸ¿ Dueces
Great app I absolutely love the show customize you can personalize the shoe you love and is easy to work with one you understand and is a great app to purchase highly recommend ðŸ˜ƒðŸ‘ðŸ»

Vary good, thay wear great, Alexander, and ethan, helping me, i need a lot of help, almost,70 years young, theses people, and all of the young ladies, just fantastic, fabulous, five stars, out of five ,great store.

App is not working. I always get stuck in the processing page and it's not letting me input my OTP to pay for my order. Nike is a company but it's disappointing that they cant even invest in their app development ðŸ«
Sign up is extremely easy and worth it. The ability to make your own custom shoes is awesome. Very user friendly.

Love this app. I bought alot of sneakers! I also bought sweat pants for me and my husband, they are so comfortable. Bought my mom a short jacket, she loves it. Need to buy her another but a different color. I'm a very satisfied customer.
They always come through with the freshest kicks. I have a common shoes size so alot of the time, my shoe of choice is sold out. Other than that, they get it done.
Always get my orders on time and good quality. What can be improved though is the exchange process. I tried to exchange pants jut was not successful.
The app is good, I am using it often. The only minus is that I didn't receive my birthday discount which is today! And to be honest that's very disappointing, I was looking forward for it.
I love the app! It keeps track of all my orders and items I have marked as favorites for future consideration.
Delivery was taking too long, app not providing exact location where the item was being drop,shipping fee is too pricey,worst app ever.
Love the app, but it's been a few times when the bot or reseller can buy all the shoes and be reselling them while you are still waiting to get your pr of J's.
Always a good experience. A lot of my purchases come from California and I'm in Phoenix so shipping is usually pretty quick
Gotta stay on top of the new drops, and current promos. âœŒï¸Thnx Nike. Also, stay on top of the bugs if y'all want me to order from y'all. Last couple days I couldn't get on app.
STUPIDITY. I cannot log in because you needed code for security, i will switch with my browser, then going back it will return into putting email then code again. STUPIDITY
It's always hanging. I always have to exit the app. I couldn't view the selections very well or buy anything because of this glitch.
App crashes as soon as I sign in for months. Terrible app. No one reaches back at customer support. Guess its stripes over checks!

I downloaded the app and registered. But when I try to sign in and press continue it just takes me back to the sign in page of the app. I tried restarting it but it didn't help at all and just routed me to the same sign-in screen/join us. Disappointed, I'll delete the app.

Hey, supposedly you have a promo for Members Day in MX, the code provided by you guys gives you a 20% discount for more than 4k pesos purchases, but the code isnt working, what a scam, and the app is no longer available, is not opening, I been buying my sneakers for years and after the last update is no longer working.

Waste of time. Tried to purchase shoes for my daughter and the order was cancelled. Called to find out why and was told my account information didn't match my payment information. 100% false. I paid with PayPal, and everything matches. Guess Nike doesn't want my money so will be looking else where.

Good deals inside the app! Great sales! One issue I have is the app can't correctly find my address. I live in a duplex, and my apartment number is a 1/2, and it says my address is incorrect. There's nowhere to add shipping details to explain this so the driver will probably drop it to my neighbors. Not sure how to fix this issue, but it needs to be addressed somehow.

Hard to place orders doesn't let you use vouchers on the app you have to go into website to do so. Also if your cleaning out your shoe closet and find 4 or more pairs to send in because of the 2year thing they have they will ban you even though it's never stated any where that your limited.
Full of errors. I am unable to complete my birthday code as I can only see an error message each time I try to open it .

Love Nike. Great app. The app offers members only products and discounts. Has frequent sales and promo codes for discounts. Keeps me informed of the newest drops and ships fast. Orders usually arrive in 3 business days
Very nice experience. Q was helpful and knowledgeable. Cashier was friendly and prompt.

Most of the time when I'm scrolling down using my thumb, it swipes right. I swipe back left to return to where I was, but all my filter settings are lost and I have to start all over again. When I try again and swipe down, same thing happens... Unfortunately I just give up shopping on this app.
It's a little funny to navigate, but it's still a good app. Often, they have better prices and options.
Good range of products. Free delivery and free returns makes for a fuss free shopping experience.

The app is very sensitive to the touch while browsing. It has a major tendency to confuse scrolling from swiping. Very annoying especially when I have already sorted a list and then have to start all over again.

Always an error, error error error never fails , even with the website it's self. All this money they make , they can at least have a functional app/website. You gotta clear your cache and data for the app. And for the website you gotta clear your history. All this in order to use this app/ website . Error error error , please fix ! Not tomorrow not next week or month , now!!!
Great app! Already bought a pair of team Jordans. My only issue is that you can't find older, certain pairs of nike shoes.

Just being able to create your own style speaks for itself. And being a member saves you 25% off your purchase, who doesn't love saving money, I know I sure do. I sure wish they would bring shox back, they were my favorite.
absolutely cool looking at those shoes, i recommend additional discounts for members and more sales on soccer stuff... .Love the shoe box bag.ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜

Tried joining Newjeans wait list but keep getting registration error. Thought maybe because I didn't register my number. So I did, but after inputting my number and getting a code, the app restarts so I cannot enter my code. I kept trying until it says I cannot add my phone number for security reasons when it's all the app problem. Now I'm sure I can't even join the waitlist at all
Glitchy, buggy, freezes often, doesn't matter what device. I've yet to get from a search to a completed purchase yet without something going wrong.

Been trying to use my 4 gift cards since Christmas and there is always a error I contacted customer service and never got a reason why. I've checked the balance it says money on there n all. So jus a little frustrated I've worn nike my whole life lol

Trash app. Didn't receive my package and email me saying I received multiple refunds at my address when I never have. So their pretty comfortable calling their customers liars and don't care as long as they keep the money on their end. Now I'm out $200 and some shoes and they do not care.
I love the app, I would also like more recommendations on stability long distance running shoes. Especially when they are on promotion/sale
Used to work fine. Now every time I open it shows a qr code that I can't get rid of. Very frustrating as I wanted to order 2 pairs of trainers ðŸ‘Ÿ
Loaded a gift card and it won't let me use it. Customer service was inept to help me. I've been a loyal Nike enthusist for years and this whole process has me reconsidering.

I placed order it was confirmed 5 minutes later nike cancelled it . Was it because they let me take an additional 25% off total then realized it once they already processed my order I think that false advertising and not ok in a court of law what's really going on at Nike giess tget dont stick by their word. Sad I've been Rockin with Nike since 86' greedy bastards

Only use App to try to get shoes. In nikes case you cant get any shoes on release day.. Always got to go to Other retailers for gear. New balance and Adidas are easier to get you hands on than rabid nike crackheads.
Always a pleasant shopping experience on this nike app. Every option works like it's suppose to. Shipping normally comes a few days early in Baltimore, MD
Availability is poor. Only show off and better ones are always out of stock. I am paying money for the best. But being one of the top company in the world, very disappointing. 1star
Hang tight while we retrieve your information! Literally won't do anything, been waiting 10 minutes and it won't let me sign into my account. Have tried for multiple days and still nothing.
I like the app It makes shopping easier. Less time in the store, or go to a store that they suggest and you can find the product
